body:
Well after 3 years of being a community member ; 2 years altogether of being staff i have finally achieved what many have known how
much  i have wanted to get for ages. I'm looking forward so much to hopefully do the best for you guys <3
 
For anyone who doesn't know i'm part of the community relations section of the senior mod team , so hopefully mr pizza is friendly enough for you all :D 
In 2 days i'll be going on Holiday to Ireland just a disclaimer before you all start calling me inactive :^)
So if you have any questions about me or my trip go for it!

replies.body:
McFanta:
I am 14
I enjoy running and cycling *and playing games too much*
pizza and water (i hate fizzy drinks , i know i'm weird.
probably cycling
Fox

CammyGee: Nice guy we should really talk more. 

Posighdun:
You already know my opinions on you :)
Great admin  , really enjoy  having someone on the staff team i can just go and talk to whenever. On top of that your just in general a really friendly , sociable guy!

What made me come back?
Well when Peachy & Iron approached me the main thing that motivated me was 100% the community it's the only reason nearly all us do this.

Shami: If you need some pizza carry sure :^)
I'm 14
I mean , i would say Apollo. *no bias at all* 
I remember you used to be quite toxic but you seem to have matured more recently which i'm really happy to see. We should talk on ts more :D

Eteh: 
I would quite like to go to Thailand since i've been next door , Vietnam.
Cause it's pizza.
You have the best username ever. Eat-Tea
But besides that you yourself are a really mature guy and i was very happy when you got promoted to mod. <3

Xuph I'm not even........  ;-;

Borrah:
To good at pvp for your ping :P
If i do a good job and the community wants it. And of course if the opportunity arises then i would be willing to try it out , yes.
Well considering my Sr Mod my opinon on Avn is quite good :) I love this community i've never been able to find one i fit in to better and i'm so glad you guys are all here <3
Windows hands down
Pc 

DaFrozenBlaze:
Yes you can eat me , beware of the sauce :^)
As i said above on borrah's question if everything comes together i do think i have the right mindset to go for it.
Why do i sound like this? Puberty , simply put.
As for maturity even though that can partly be put down to  that also. I like to think my parents are thanks to that.
Why 334? Boring story really. I wanted a mc name when i was 11 and i wanted to sound like 'james bond' so i was like , "oo i know pizza334" yeah boring i know.
Taco334 was a inside joke that sem used to call me 24/7 so i changed my name to it for a month.
Hard to believe now , agreed. :P

replies.body:
Harvey! So glad you got to experience the feeling when you get that dark red tag, my heart jumped out of my chest at 5am. But after working for years, with the same one target is incredible determination. You're looked up to by a lot of people; and I'm one of them. Great job man. :)

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. Do you sing whilst taking a shower/bath?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. What was your first thought when you woke up this morning?
  5. What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
  6. What is your favourite month of the year?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
  9. What is your perfect pizza?
Hope you're enjoying this fricking amazing half-term holiday! :D

Take it easy, - Aura
